oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Backlund transformations for the nonlinear evolution equation z(yy)=[A(x,y,z)z(x)](x)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: JENA, J
SHARMA, VD
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: linear wave-equation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A Backlund transformation associated with a quasilinear partial differential equation of second order is derived using the invariance properties. The procedure provides a suitable mathematical vehicle for characterizing the coefficient function for the existence of such a transformation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: NUOVO CIMENTO DELLA SOCIETA ITALIANA DI FISICA B-GENERAL PHYSICS RELATIVITY ASTRONOMY AND MATHEMATICAL PHYSICS AND METHODS, 113(2), 213-219
